properties.name: spring.datasource.source.jdbc-url
properties.description: JDBC URL for the source database.

properties.name: spring.datasource.source.driver-class-name
properties.description: Driver class name for the source database.

properties.name: spring.datasource.source.hikari.connection-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout for the Hikari pool in the source database.

properties.name: spring.datasource.source.hikari.maximum-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum pool size for the Hikari pool in the source database.

properties.name: spring.datasource.destination.jdbc-url
properties.description: JDBC URL for the destination database.

properties.name: spring.datasource.destination.driver-class-name
properties.description: Driver class name for the destination database.

properties.name: spring.datasource.destination.hikari.connection-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout for the Hikari pool in the destination database.

properties.name: spring.datasource.destination.hikari.maximum-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum pool size for the Hikari pool in the destination database.
